com.yantra.ycp.japi.util

Interface YCPExceptionConsolidator


  • public interface YCPExceptionConsolidator
    The interface is used for exception consolidation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document getModifiedDataXML(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inboxXML, org.w3c.dom.Document consolodationXML)
      The YCPExceptionConsolidator interface is called by the createException API before executing any application logic.The createException will pick up the inbox_addnl_data attribute from the input and pass it to this method for the exception type.

    • Method Detail

      • getModifiedDataXML

        org.w3c.dom.Document getModifiedDataXML(YFSEnvironment env,
                                        org.w3c.dom.Document inboxXML,
                                        org.w3c.dom.Document consolodationXML)

        The YCPExceptionConsolidator interface is called by the createException API before executing any application logic.The createException will pick up the inbox_addnl_data attribute from the input and pass it to this method for the exception type. The method will return a modified xml.

        To code custom logic, implement the method in this interface. The system calls the methods in your class. If this method gives any exception, the current transaction is rolled back.


        Related Yantra Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD

        Pre-conditions: This Interface is called unconditionally.

        Post-conditions: The return parameter should contain modified value for INBOX_ADDNL_DATA .


        env Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API. This is required for the interface to raise errors and access environment information. inboxXML Required.The inbox XML tocreateException API. For more information, see the associated input xml files. consolodationXML Required.The inbox XML of the exception to which it is going to be consolidated.


        A modified Inbox XML. For details on the output, refer to the associated output files.
